abstract: Few receivers are better equipped to thrive in the red zone, where spacing is tight, than Plaxico Burress.
snippet: Few receivers are better equipped to thrive in the red zone, where spacing is tight, than Plaxico Burress.
lead_paragraph: Andy Benoit takes a quick tour of all the Week 7 games. Did he miss something? Share your thoughts in the comments. Jets 27,   Chargers 21

headline.main: Week 7 Quick Hits: The Return of Big-Game Burress
